mapper.select: SELECT a.stifSeq ,a.stifName ,a.stifDesc ,a.stifAddress1 ,a.stifAddress2 ,a.stifOC ,a.stifFoodTypeCd ,b.stphNumber ,c.stlcName ,c.stlcLat ,c.stlcLng FROM StoreInfo a left join eatja.StoreTel as b on b.StoreInfo_stifSeq = a.stifSeq and b.stphDelNy = 0 left join eatja.StoreLocation as c on c.StoreInfo_stifSeq = a.stifSeq and c.stlcDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND stifDelNy = 0 AND stifSeq = #{stifSeq}
SELECT stmnSeq ,stmnName ,stmnPrice ,stmnDelNy FROM StoreMenu WHERE 1=1 AND StoreInfo_stifSeq = #{stifSeq}
SELECT year ,month ,day ,uuidName ,ext FROM infrMemberUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{stifSeq} AND type = 0
